title: 08.12.04.Silent Hill 4 USA XBOX-LIGHTFORCE
description:
Silent Hill 4 (c) Konami                            

   &lt;--( Release Information )------------------------------------- ----- --&gt;   

    Console System.: XBOX                  -  Country......: NTSC/USA          
    Game Type......: Horror Adventure      -  Languages....: English           
    Backup Format..: DVD/XiSO              -  Sizes........: 40 x 50 MB
    Release Date...: 12.08.2004            -  Ripped.......: See Notes!
    Orginal........: DVD                   -  Filenames....: silent.hill4.XX   

   &lt;--( Game Info )----------------------------------------------- ----- --&gt;   

   The fourth game in Konami's Silent Hill series will see you assuming the    
   role of a man trapped in his cursed apartment.                              

   &lt;--( RIP Notes )----------------------------------------------- ----- --&gt;   

   Full DVD!                                                                                                                                      

   &lt;--( Group Notes )--------------------------------------------- ----- --&gt;   

   Enjoy this damn nice game a few weeks before Street Date!
